attributes.action: Allow Gurkha soldiers and their immediate families the right to British citizenship
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition has been written to provide current and former Gurkha servicemen and women, along with their immediate families, the opportunity to gain British citizenship.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Allow Gurkha soldiers and their immediate families the right to British citizenship."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19394


Prime Minister's Office
